title: From Dust Crack Only
description:
This is not mine, I am simply uploading it to tpb as it's not here yet.

#1 Install the game. <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6608362/From_Dust-ALI213_by_Sonuyos__amp__TOMEK1166" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6608362/From_Dust-ALI213_by_Sonuyos__amp__TOMEK1166</a>  Was what I used.
#2 Update the game with the ubisoft launcher.
#3 Make sure you turn off save game syncing in the launcher options.
#4 Copy the crack from the rar to C:\Program Files (x86)\Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher or wherever you installed to.
#5 Create an account with ubisoft.
#6 Type in any serial when it asks
#7 Play!

Working and virus free. <a href=" http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=9127e31c69f0e5298ceb03ac0a49e9de5e8d3c64a1c6815d46c4286c6ca9df4f-1313526198" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=9127e31c69f0e5298ceb03ac0a49e9de5e8d3c64a1c6815d46c4286c6ca9df4f-1313526198</a>
